apiKey.setupDescription: To use AI features, you need to provide your own API Key (Google Gemini or OpenAI). It's free and we only store it in your browser.
apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.placeholder: Paste your API key here (AIza... or sk-...)
apiKey.formatHint: Supported formats: Google Gemini (AIza...) or OpenAI (sk-...)
apiKey.recommendationText: We recommend Google Gemini for better Vietnamese language support and it's completely free!

errors.invalidFormat:
Invalid API key format. Please check and try again.
Gemini keys start with 'AIza', OpenAI keys start with 'sk-'
